amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit $250,000 from being used for the Monroe County Farmer's Market facility construction project of the Monroe County Fiscal Court.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part B of House Report 111-219 to prohibit $250,000 from being used for the Monroe County Farmer's Market facility construction project of the Monroe County Fiscal Court and reduce the amount of the appropriate section of the bill by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 98 - 331 (Roll no. 631).
